h1_content:
**Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang** is a large frog Spirit you will encounter on Black Wind Mountain in Black Myth: Wukong. On this page, we will go over everything you need to know about Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang, including where to find it, how to defeat it, and what Spirit Powers it grants you.
* Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Location
* Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Fight
* Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Spirit
Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang can be fully upgraded using Tadpoles to unlock the Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang Spirit!
Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Spirit
h2_content: Once you reach the Snake Trail Keeper's Shrine, run up the stairs on the right and take a left. You will come across a flimsy fence on the edge of a cliff on the left. Smash the fence and drop into the river below. Run to the right to find Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang_Spirit.md', located in the main section titled 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Spirit'. The section summary is: **Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang** is a large frog Spirit you will encounter on Black Wind Mountain in Black Myth: Wukong. On this page, we will go over everything you need to know about Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang, including where to find it, how to defeat it, and what Spirit Powers it grants you.
* Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Location
* Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Fight
* Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Spirit
Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang can be fully upgraded using Tadpoles to unlock the Baw-Baw-Lang-Lang Spirit!
Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Spirit This excerpt merges content from both the main and sub-sections. The sub-section is titled 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Location', and the detailed content is as follows:
Once you reach the Snake Trail Keeper's Shrine, run up the stairs on the right and take a left. You will come across a flimsy fence on the edge of a cliff on the left. Smash the fence and drop into the river below. Run to the right to find Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang.
